name: Morellonomicon
passive: Cursed: Magic damage inflicts Grievous Wounds on enemies below 50% Health for 3 seconds.
description: Item that provides Ability Power, Health, Ability Haste. Passive effect: Magic damage inflicts Grievous Wounds on enemies below 50% Health for 3 seconds.. Perfect for frontline champions who need to absorb damage.
tips: Essential against teams with healing or lifesteal
Applies Grievous Wounds to reduce enemy healing
Great for dealing with champions like Soraka, Dr. Mundo, or Vladimir
The health provides some survivability for mages
Consider building this when facing multiple healing sources
